verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Himself drew near And joined them as they walked And soon their hearts Began to burn As of Himself He talked Draw near O Lord Draw near O Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Himself drew near They were no longer sad When He was walking At their side How could they but be glad Draw near O Lord Draw near O Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Himself drew near And all their doubts were solved He showed them why Christ came to die And what that death involved Draw near O Lord Draw near O Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Himself drew near And at the journey's end They could not let Him Leave them thus The Stranger was their friend Draw near O Lord Draw near O Lord{/lang-eng}
